description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5a89i","text":"This protocol describes three mycoplasma removal procedures to be utilized depending on need. The protocols are described from milder/maintenance to the harshest option to be used in extreme cases of contamination when it is not possible ato re-start the culture from a clear source.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"5jqv","text":"These protocols were not originally developed by the Lopez Lab. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"9uvfp","text":"Mycoplasma Removal Agent, MP Biomedicals, cat #093050044 - 5 ml  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":65}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcv09","text":"(Stored at room temperature)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5cbt7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7rip4","text":"Plasmocin treatment agent, Invivogen, cat #ant-mpt Aliquot and Store at -20°C in TC\nfreezer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":91}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqaag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmap0","text":"Tiamulin, Santa Cruz, cat #sc-237107, (resuspend and dilute in 100% ethanol) Aliquot and Store at 4°C in TC fridge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":116}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56ofd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37bh6","text":"Minocycline Hydrochloride, Acros Organics, cat #455330010  Aliquot and Store at -20°C in TC\nfreezer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":99}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eah59","text":"NOTES for effective treatment\n\nA. All treatment antibiotics should be added directly to the media at time of use.  They should not be diluted or stored in media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd60p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj57v","text":"B. For the most effective treatment, the cells should be trypsinized when the media is changed to release any mycoplasma that is hiding/trapped between the cell and the plastic of the well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ve3h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8jm","text":"C. If cells require splitting prior to the end of a given treatment, trypsinize and split as normal, replace the antibiotic and continue the same round of antibiotic treatment (ie, it does not count as a new round of treatment).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5gp2","text":"Cells from Lopez Lab cell stocks or trusted labs (previously confirmed Mycoplasma free):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":88}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dmd1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mrbe","text":"Split cells very thinly (\u003c20% confluent) in regular tissue culture media.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t15l","text":"Add 10ul MRA per mL (up to 1mL total in a 6 wells plate).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3932r","text":"Refresh media and MRA every 2 days over the course of 2-4 days (1-2 rounds of treatment).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2uutg","text":"Passage cells normally, freeze aliquots as needed.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3lpj","text":"Discard cells at 15 passages post treatment to prevent re-growth of mycoplasma.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1r4a2","text":"Heavily contaminated cell lines or from labs with unknown mycoplasma testing procedures:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":88}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"388u0","text":"MRA treatment (Fluoroquinolone class antibiotic)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":48},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77tbv","text":"Reagent: Mycoplasma Removal Agent, MP Biomedicals, cat #093050044 - 5 ml  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":74}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qb14","text":"(Stored at room temperature)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bn2qb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j2fg","text":"1. Split cells very thinly (\u003c20% confluent) in regular tissue culture media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euf9l","text":"2. Add 10ul MRA per mL (up to 1mL total in a 6 wells plate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b943e","text":"3. Refresh media and MRA every 2 days over the course of 8 days (4 rounds of treatment)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l1uf","text":"4. Test for mycoplasma (See Mycoplasma Testing Protocol)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d46n5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3egs","text":"***If cells are negative, they can be used normally (label cryo stocks as G1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83kg2","text":"***If cells are borderline, move to Step 4 – Plasmocin treatment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e71h","text":"***If cells are positive, go directly to Step 5 – BM-Cyclin treatment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"flltb","text":"Plasmocin (Fluoroquinolone class antibiotic + Macrolide)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":56},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":56}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lfnn","text":"Reagent: Plasmocin treatment agent, Invivogen, cat #ant-mpt Aliquot and Store at -20°C in TC\nfreezer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":100}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d0ip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bt5hb","text":"Split cells very thinly (\u003c20% confluent) in regular tissue culture media","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qkm0","text":"Add 1ul Plasmocin (25mg/ml stock) per mL (up to 1mL total in a 6well plate) for a final concentration of 25ug/ml","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvoie","text":"Refresh media and Plasmocin every 2 days over the course of 14 days (7 rounds of treatment)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efemo","text":"Re-test for mycoplasma (See Mycoplasma Testing Protocol)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75s08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dv1i","text":"***If cells are negative, they can be used normally (label cryo stocks as G1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r9g","text":"***If cells are still borderline or positive, go to Step 5 – BM-Cyclin treatment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":52,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cj9uc","text":"BM-Cyclin with Tiamulin and Minocycline (alternating Pleuromutilin+ Tetracycline class antibiotics)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":67},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":68,"length":31},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":99}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dshk0","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1bq6","text":"Tiamulin, Santa Cruz, cat #sc-237107, (resuspend and dilute in 100% ethanol) Aliquot and Store at 4°C in TC fridge. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":116}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c63be","text":"Minocycline Hydrochloride, Acros Organics, cat #455330010  Aliquot and Store at -20°C in TC\nfreezer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":99}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8uf5r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gsrd","text":"Split cells very thinly (\u003c20% confluent) in regular tissue culture media","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhv6v","text":"Add 4ul Tiamulin (2.5mg/ml stock) per mL (up to 1mL total in a 6well plate) for a final concentration of 10ug/ml","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ikpn","text":"Incubate for 3 days","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef7nv","text":"Trypsinize cells, wash with PBS, split as needed, and refresh media","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"das7j","text":"Add 4ul Minocycline (1.25mg/ml stock) per mL (up to 1mL total in a 6well plate) for a final concentration of 5ug/ml","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17o5e","text":"Incubate for 2 days","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjn82","text":"Refresh media and Minocycline, incubate for 2 days","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3opvt","text":"Trypsinize cells, wash with PBS, split as needed, and refresh media","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djdfq","text":"Repeat steps 2-7 twice more for a total of 21 days","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1go8r","text":"Re-test for mycoplasma (See Mycoplasma Testing Protocol)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9msue","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jtts","text":"***If cells are negative, they can be used normally (label cryo stocks as G1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77k3","text":"***If cells are still borderline or positive, restart BM-Cyclin treatment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Mycoplasma Removal Treatment Protocols
